lib.hdf5¶

module to read/write python dict from/to hdf5 files

Functions

load_dict_from_hdf5(filename, path)

read dict from hdf5

recursively_load_dict_contents_from_group(…)

helper recursive function for load_dict_from_hdf5

recursively_save_dict_contents_to_group(…)

helper recursive function for save_dict_to_hdf5

save_dict_to_hdf5(dic, filename[, path, mode])

save dict to hdf5
lib.hdf5.save_dict_to_hdf5(dic, filename, path='/', mode='a')[source]¶

save dict to hdf5

Parameters

  • dic (dict) – dictionary to be saved

  • filename (str) – name of hdf5 file

Warning

Item must be one of these types [np.ndarray, np.int64, np.float64, str, bytes, int]

lib.hdf5.recursively_save_dict_contents_to_group(h5file, path, dic)[source]¶

helper recursive function for save_dict_to_hdf5

lib.hdf5.load_dict_from_hdf5(filename, path)[source]¶

read dict from hdf5

Parameters

  • filename (str) – name of hdf5 file

  • path – path in hdf5 to the dict or groups to be loaded

Returns

dictionary

Return type

dict

Example::

mydict = load_dict_from_hdf5(‘path/dataset.h5’,’’)

lib.hdf5.recursively_load_dict_contents_from_group(h5file, path)[source]¶

helper recursive function for load_dict_from_hdf5
